mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Prentis, William
mdRecord.dcterms:description: First volume of Burk's "History of Virginia" published; has interested Mr. Madison of Williamsburg in preparing a map of Virginia; bearer, Mr. William Davis, is visiting principal towns with the map; asks Jefferson to see him; Mr. Bassler [?] of Switzerland engaged to engrave map.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Burk, John, d. 1808
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1805 June 3, Petersburg, [Virginia] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
